commenter_a: Only 3% of Planned Parenthood's funding goes to providing abortion. None of that money comes from taxpayers. Defunding Planned Parenthood means defunding millions of dollars in preventive care, cancer screening, contraception (which reduces abortion), STI screening, and other such essential services. I'm pro-choice, but if you guys have such a problem with abortion, why don't you just campaign to force Planned Parenthood to stop providing abortion services and leave everything else intact?
